description: This is the alert trap table for Quicksilver. A
notify is sent on this table when an alerting condition
is met in Quicksilver. Logs associated with the alert are
supplied in the Description, Details, Cause, Effect
and Action fields.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrap QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapAlertname s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapAlertID s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapStatus i 1 QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapScopeType s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapScopeName s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapTimestamp u 9999 QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapSeverity i 1 QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapDescription s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapDetails s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapCause s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapEffect s EXAMPLE QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapAction s EXAMPLE

description: Name of the alert as defined in the Prometheus alerting
rules.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapAlertname

description: Unique identifier for the alert. A comma separated list of
Prometheus <label>:<labelvalue> pairs for the alert.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapAlertID

description: Status of the alert.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapStatus

description: The scope of this alert. E.g. 'instance', 'site'
'deployment'.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapScopeType

description: The name of the object with the scope defined in
alertTrapScopeType. E.g. If the scope type is 'instance'
this is the name/IP of the instance.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapScopeName

description: Time of the most recent status change of this alert in
seconds since Jan 1 1970.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapTimestamp

description: Severity of the alert.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapSeverity

description: Detailed description of the alert.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapDescription

description: Details about the alerting condition.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapDetails

description: Information on possible causes of the alert.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapCause

description: Information on other events that may occur as a
result of the alerting condition.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapEffect

description: Suggested actions that you can take to resolve the problem.
variables.name: QUICKSILVER-ALERT-MIB::alertTrapAction
